extendedInfo.description: "Monster Catch+" is fun and simple action game.Throw the arm again and again and catch the monster as many as possible.-Gameplay-When the arm is swung from side to side, press the "Catch" button at the right time, you can catch the monster. Angle and timing of arm is important to catch the monster.-Stage-When you exceed the setting score that you are required to, you can play the stage of next level.Try to complete all stages!-Item-It might be not easy to get rare and strong monster. If you really want to get the such monster, one way is to use better ocarina and stronger arm.Ocarina: the higher level one, the more monsters are appeared.Arm: the higher level one, the faster and stronger throwing.-Rnking-This game has international and domestic ranking. Can you put your name on the leaderboard also?

reviews.title: The game is horrible
reviews.comment: (Lvl 6)way too hard dont get this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game itself installs and runs fine. However poor ad placement makes pushing catch button while avoiding the ad a game itself.
reviews.author: A Google User
